Class Cart

java.lang.Object
com.nibblenow.app.Cart
public class Cart extends Object
Cart: An object that represents a cart for a user. The MenuItems are stored in an ArrayList called contents. This class contains methods that act on the contents ArrayList.
Author:
Nikolaos Komninos

    • Cart

      public Cart()
      Default constructor for Cart class

  • Method Details

    • getContents

      public ArrayList<MenuItem> getContents()
      Returns the contents of the cart as an ArrayList of MenuItem's
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Menu Item's representing the contents of the cart.

    • setContents

      public void setContents(ArrayList<MenuItem> newContents)
      Sets the contents of the cart given an ArrayList of MenuItem's
      Parameters:
      newContents - this is an ArrayList of Menu Item's that will replace the current contents in this cart.

    • clearContents

      public void clearContents()
      Clears the contents of the cart

    • isEqual

      public boolean isEqual(Cart cart_p)
      Checks to see if the carts are equal by iterating through the items in contents and uses the custom equals method that was written for the MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      cart_p - represents the cart we are comparing
      Returns:
      True if the two carts are the same, false otherwise.

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(MenuItem newContent)
      This function will add a MenuItem to the cart or the contents ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      newContent - this is the MenuItem that should be added to the cart.

    • removeFromCart

      public MenuItem removeFromCart(MenuItem item)
      Removes an item from a user's cart
      Parameters:
      item - the item being removed from the cart
      Returns:
      the removed item

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      This function will check to see if the cart is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the cart is empty, false otherwise.
